reply.title: Replies
reply.noRepliesHint: Send the first reply for this feedback

templates.received: Thank you for your feedback. We have received it and will process it as soon as possible.
templates.investigating: We are investigating the issue you reported. We will update you with the results shortly.
templates.resolved: The issue you reported has been resolved. Please check again and let us know if the problem persists.
templates.needInfo: We need more information to process your request. Please provide additional details.
templates.planned: Thank you for your suggestion. We have noted it and will consider it in upcoming updates.
